website_summaries.verdict: Includes a generous supply of duplicate markers, so multiple users can share colors.
pros: Set of 100 markers – some duplicates or subtle shades
Resists bleeding on coloring book paper
Tips render thick or thin lines, depending on angle and pressure
Container holds pens in place, easy removal and storage
cons: Many colors are muted, not bold

customer_reviews.title: Missing pigments
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my classroom since they're such a great deal, unfortunately several of the markers have no pigment in them. See picture for reference. Definitely disappointed about that.
customer_reviews.author: vcb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, and I plan on purchasing these again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (8) is currently in a phase where she draws ALL THE TIME. For a relatively cheap Christmas present, I ordered these. They are her all-time favorite markers, in fact she doesn't even use any of her old markers any more. She even loves the box they came in (even though I offered to get her a nicer permanent tote box or bag). Highly recommended and I will order more in the future as these get used up. Personally, I love the variety and scope of colors, and the shape of the markers allows for fine lines as well as shading and filling in. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Cindy Beavers

customer_reviews.title: A compact box holding a whomping 101 markers, instead of 100!
customer_reviews.text: I counted the markers in my box, and it ended up with 101 markers instead of 100, all different colors! Since none of them have named colors on them, it'll be tough to tell if the 101st marker is a copy of one of the other hundred! What's more, they were less than $15 altogether, including tax! They all came in a compact box, which is tough to spread apart compared to the instructions. They sure work good, for markers that ain't Crayola! If you or someone you know loves drawing and coloring, try this little-giant marker set today!
customer_reviews.author: ToonXpert87

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with these markers
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and tried out these markers I found 6 bad markers in the box. 4 of the markers were dried out, and 2 of them were almost dried out and barely colored. I was a little hesitant on buying markers this way without being able to "test" them out first but I am recovering from surgery and was unable to get out of the house. I'm not returning them because its not worth the hassle right now.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: No way these were brand new.. Dried up and not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.text: They work fine enough but there has to be some version of false advertising because these are not brand new. The box is in bad shape like someone jammed the markers into it not to mention the long black hair strung between the markers. They look okay but if I find some are dried out or used I will be returning. Update: Some of the markers are in fact dried up and unusable. When going to return these they are not eligible for return. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: P Lane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but disappointing results thus far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set of markers because the colors are unique and beautiful, and different from Crayola 100-pack markers. One stars, however, because there were 2 or 3 colors in the package that either had no pigment in the ink or were nearly used up or dried up (probably very little ink to begin with). Seller replaced original package, but the replacement package had the same problem. Very disappointing, since I am an artist relying on these colors to do several coloring courses for school students. I will be making art supply recommendations, and this set may not be included if I keep getting bad markers in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: James Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Fast delivery! Work well!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price I came across so was a little nervous about what I received. I am happy with the pens. A wide array of colors and work well. I wish they come organized by color rather then just place in their randomly but easy to organize myself. The other complaint I have but this applies to all the markers i have purchased recently is the true color does not match the cap color well. Some of the pastel light colors are darker then their darker counter parts, but once you learn them then it is all good.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Sjoen

customer_reviews.title: Best markers I’ve bought for my three year old!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased all the Crayola-branded toddler-friendly products for my three-year-old artist and lots of other toddler activities including chalks, paints, build-it-then-paint-it kits, etc. I bought this set to teach my daughter the gradations of color, which unfortunately Crayola branding doesn’t support as well, for whatever reason. These markers are safe and wash out well. They’re bold colors and don’t break easily. They are well made and I’m even in love with the quality. I’m a picky mom when it comes to my daughters learning and growth, so I was very relieved to find a great product. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: MidwestMama

customer_reviews.title: Lots of soft colors, very few bold colors.
customer_reviews.text: The box these come in is nice, and the colors are true to the color of their lid. I dislike the variety of colors. There is a ton of "light/soft" colors, such as grays, beiges, tans, and then a lot of light pinks/purples. There are very few primary or bold colors. There is probably one marker that is a true-to-color for each of red, yellow, orange, green, and blue. The rest are usually very light shades of those colors. There is only about 2-3 markers that could be considered a shade of red, and the same for yellow. I don't feel this worked well as the markers a group of boys was expected to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Kong

customer_reviews.title: Not best for kids
customer_reviews.text: The caps on these markers DO NOT stay on. You really have to push to get these to click. And, since I purchased these for my little kids, the caps never get put back on all the way because it's too difficult for them, which means the caps fall when we go to put them away and they're drying out. Maybe this would be a better considered purchased for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsski

customer_reviews.title: So impressed
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I ordered these markers and another item Sunday night, and they arrived Monday late afternoon/early evening. So fast, I'm still in shock! I got these for my adult coloring book, and so far, I'm impressed. You really have to keep a piece of printer paper near by to test the computer of the markers though because the color of the cap isn't always the best depiction of the color, but it's close-ish.. Once I figure out how to add pictures I'll share an example of the quality of the markers on paper.
customer_reviews.author: Sairz

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these markers for my activity area at home. My three younger children use them, ages seven, eight, and nine. The markers are better than I expected. The ink is vibrant, and then go to swim colo I bought these markers for my activity area at home. My three younger children use them, ages seven, eight, and nine. The markers are better than I expected. The ink is vibrant, and there’s Very good assortment of colors. None of the markers have dried out and the kids of been using them pretty regularly since we got them. Will definitely buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Amanda  McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for creative kids!
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son is obsessed with writing names and letters and numbers and these markers are perfect! He was going through 10pks of markers about every 2 weeks so this 100pk lasts and he seems to want to take care of them more so than the big bulky markers. These seem to have a longer life too.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: A decent collection of colors
customer_reviews.text: The color bleeds from one page to another. That's my only complaint. I use these to color in those adult coloring books. It reduces stress for me. My only complaint is that the color bleeds. My other complaint is that multiple colors look damn near identical. The color on the outside doesn't match the color on the inside and many of them appear to be the exact shade. So you don't get 100 different colors, you just get 100 markers. But still, for the money, this is a great value. Very comparable to the Cra-Z-Art markers I bought 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: lyzeria

customer_reviews.title: Great markers for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great markers for the price. However, 4 came in dead. My recommendations for making them last longer, is either store them upside down (with tips facing down) or on their sides. When the tips are up the ink tends to drain to the opposite end. I have taken up coloring as a hobby. These markers have lasted a lot longer than Crayola, at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jody M.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and high-quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful variety of washable pens and a great value for the price. Skinny pens help children develop appropriate ways of holding pens and pencils so we were specifically looking for skinny markers and these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Taylor Peck

customer_reviews.title: i was wrong about RoseArt
customer_reviews.text: originally I didn't get roseart brand items because I got crappy crayons a long time ago. I took a chance on these for the variety and I am very happy. these markers are amazing and do come in different colors. the box was kinda damaged but I don't keep markers in their original box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Tested and approved by 4 active children ages 4-10. The only thing I’d change is an audible click when the top’s on securely. If they aren’t diligent about my warning to put the top on tightly, the pens will dry out. They’re children, and I think a click would help them know when it’s firmly closed. Time will tell on this one. They’re thrilled with all the great colors. I’m thrilled with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: sbmargo

customer_reviews.title: Run out pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: Some colors run out fairly quickly which is a bummer. The black marker was horrible on first use. But for the money with the number of markers you get, I guess it's fine. If i could go back, I'd probably pay the extra $10-$15 to get good quality ones, though.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Pomes

customer_reviews.title: Well made set of pens
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son loves to draw and he uses lots of ink. These pens are a great deal and last a long time. This is a good set of lots of pens that don't dry out and stand up to a six year old boy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon5150

customer_reviews.title: Not for writing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to write with not to color with. These were not what I was hoping for the ink is too wide for writing. You get a lot of markers for your money however they don't all work. I threw out many from the get-go because they barely had any ink in them. I will choose a different brand next time
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good for a classroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 100ct for my science classroom. I needed a large amount for a small price. Have had them for about 1 year and they are all still working! The box was nice but it didnt hold up to my kids so I eventually tossed it out and put my markers in a plastic bin. I'm thinking of getting another box.
customer_reviews.author: Laprizzle

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers, my granddaughter uses markers in her school in prek. And I wanted her to have every color she could want, and this box has every color and more. The tips aren't either too small or either too big, she colors with them, and loves them. When I color with her I always outline the picture in the color she wants me to use and they are great for that also. And the big plus is they are washable because she sometimes colors more on her hand than the page she's coloring with. Also if she decides she wants to use the markers to play games or write with, she can do that with the markers also.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: Water based markers perfect to use in color by number books. I also use in coloring books that have double sided pages as water based markers tend to not bleed through to reverse side thus ruining the other picture. Ink washes off skin with soap and water so perfect for the little ones. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: I bought these before
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before and loved them. This past month I bought a set had a problem with them. Contacted the manufacturer and they helped me. I would recommend these to anyone! Fast service if you have a problem. Awesome markers and I love them. They are my go to markers! I like them more than anything!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to accompany the 100-set Crayola Supertips that I color with daily. I was initially annoyed that the marker caps don't match the actual ink color well. These must be swatched to keep track of the true color. That being said, I now use this set of markers MORE than I do my beloved Crayola Supertips because I like the interesting color shades more - there are some very vibrant colors that really pop.
customer_reviews.author: EJV

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value. So many color choices. Everyone in the house uses them. Would make a great gift. Used in scrapbooking, kid crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Holden

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our 2yo granddaughter to color using markers. she's loves all the different colors. bonus--she's learning all the different shades of greens, blues, purples etc. thanks
customer_reviews.author: gloverelace dot com

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to give it 4 starts
customer_reviews.text: Great color selection of markers in the box of 100. Colors are not as opaque as other brands but that only gives a different feel and visual texture to the mandala books I color. Was disappointed that right out of the box about 20 of them were dried out and unusable. Don't know if that was mishandling on part of the seller or the manufacturers process. Will probably order again, but not set my hopes too high.
customer_reviews.author: Gnomers

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: First the good. Nice assortment of colors. Pretty solid value. Now the bad. Haven’t gone through the whole box yet but a little over half way through I’ve found 3 dried out markers. My 5 year old gets frustrated by the cap colors. She will grab a yellow capped marker and the color won’t even be in the ballpark. Mostly orange with a hint of yellow. It’s happened a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cuse

customer_reviews.title: no ink????
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely great for the price, however the box ripped very easily while trying to do the pop out feature, and so far I've found 4 markers all around the same color that have 0 ink in them. Not like they are dried out, I mean the tips are still bright white and there is no color or ink in them. Which is a bummer because I really wanted these colors. But that being said I am still satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ammikins

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth draw/color but has similar colors.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an overall good product. The only reason I did not give it a five star review is because a lot of the colors are very similar in color. Honestly a couple of them when trying them out look exactly the same. Other than that lots of markers for the price, and draw and color very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel.c

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: The lids don't match the color of the markers. They are not bleeding through the construction paper I am using but when I need to use a ruler to draw a chart or graph the color of the line "drags". When using two color directly next to one another the 2 colors will bleed into one another. Will go back to using Sharpie's in the future. I ordered these because I have a tendency to get marker all over my hands I thought the washability feature but they really did not wash off my hands easily.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, but markers don't work well
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the array of colors available. However, several of the markers don't work well. I'm not sure if they are dried out or if they just don't contain enough ink to provide good color saturation. That's too bad, because the colors are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Peaks

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: I needed specific colors to match to pH level paper. It was hard to find matching colors without spending a fortune. I was thrilled to find the RoseArt 100 pack as it had just what I needed without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: Dried up upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Well these aren't very good. I got them for my kid since we're now stuck home schooling and when we opened them up half of them were dry and dead, and they aren't elegible for return otherwise they'd be going back. That was a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great buy- super value
customer_reviews.text: Best markers so far! I got these based on the price, quantity and color variance. They are not only perfect for kids- but make adults want to color too! Great buy, I will be purchasing again as a gift and to replenish our colors! Love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: These markers are so vibrant and I love them. I liked them so much that I am on my second box of them and I also ordered my grandmother a set to use in her coloring books. These markers tend to last a long time. I ordered these back in January and I color with them every night for 2 or 3 hours and I am still on my first box. I have my second for back up because I have 2 markers that I use a lot that are almost empty. Most of my first box are still going strong and I would recommend these markers to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Janice jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For What You Get But . . .
customer_reviews.text: I think my order was a return because one of my markers has a red ink fingerprint on it. I was worried that maybe it was used up by whoever had the markers first but the fingerprinted marker worked. Aside from that, everything was great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle101

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: The caps split up the size within about two weeks of use, allowing a bunch to start to dry out. Two teal markers with no color, not dry, just zero pigment. Colors so similar they might as well be duplicate. Go get the crayola 80 pack, you're better off.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great selection
customer_reviews.text: We used to get only 8 crayons to a box. This is 100 colors and if you can't find the desired color, you are in trouble. Our youngest granddaughter loves this set. She doodles most of the day. She if 5.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great markers if they all worked.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really love this bunch of markets. The colors were great and 100 of them for 14 dollars was too good to be true. The markers are a bit darker than what the cap says it is, which is pretty standard, the problem is when some of the markers are missing the ink. I had two sets delivered and both sets had several colors that were either dead or there was no ink in the marker. I was so disappointed because I really wanted to color. I ended up buying Sargent ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Style

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for markers, but not as good as Crayola!
customer_reviews.text: As a child, I never liked the RoseArt brand. Crayola simply produces a better product; however, if you are purchasing markers for younger children, this is the way to go. I did not want to buy the higher priced if the kids are just going to dry them out by leaving the caps off. Sometimes it is better to order a higher quantity and sacrifice quality. That being said, for what you are receiving this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for three young children. The markers work well. The colors are bright and seem to last pretty well. I would have given 5 stars but I was hoping the box would work well as a place to keep the markers. Instead, it was difficult to fit all the markers back inside and the top wouldn't stay closed. If you want a good set of markers for the kids and are planning to keep them in another container, I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: Lots of markers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my two year old as he seems to prefer markers over crayons. This certainly has a wide arrange of colors. Sometimes the color is a bit of a surprise compared to the cap. They seem to work well. I'd recommend testing the color on a test sheet if you're trying to color anything special.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for kids that are learning to use markers, doesnt hurt at the wallet so much when they flatten the tips or dont put the lids on all the way or not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome markers for my adult coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are great! I love how many colors it comes with. Various shades of each color! The tip is super pointy and they run soooo smooth. I enjoy them very much and I have to get my kids their own set cus these are for mamas coloring book lol
customer_reviews.author: BeccaD

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wasn't sure i was going to love these, but I do! The colors aren't quite as vibrant and bright as Crayola but I like them. Good colors and strong ink. I'll buy again
customer_reviews.author: EBeautySue

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money especially if you need them for something like a coloring party or birthday etc in a couple days (if you have prime). The quality varies some.... some dry, some very saturated but it's 15 bucks for 100 markers. What are you gonna do, right? But the colors are definitely all different and they all work thus far. These are obviously not top of the line magical markers I'd recommend to a well-seasoned adult coloring book connoisseur, but easy investment for an easygoing beginner or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Avery TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Such a deal!
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to imagine a better deal than these for adult coloring. I will buy again to replace some of my favorite colors that I have used up. At this price discarding the dry ones is no sweat. Love the subtle colors in this set because no other set I have found has them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne MichaelsTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: ordered these for daycare
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's daycare was looking for markers so I ordered these because you couldn't beat the price. However as a mom and teacher I wouldn't normally buy Rose Art because the quality is not as good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Great markers great price.
customer_reviews.text: Jean's. these. They were great with kids in Romania who painted Christian scenes during mission trip. Came in 5 inner boxes which helped when passing around to 20 different kids. Will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Some of the colors were already faded and dried out when I received them, while others were really strong in color compared to their deceptively lighter tips. Still, they're cheap markers, and you get a good variety of them for a more than reasonable price. If you're just planning on buying these for your kids or for coloring something simple yourself, they do a decent enough job!
customer_reviews.author: Pufferung

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price !! The only thing is the box didn’t work as intended by moving the markers up when pulling up on it. Still great value for the price, my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mastrigt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted to get for the teachers
customer_reviews.text: When I got a notice from teachers in BOTH of my kids grade levels, asking for help with diminishing supplies, I made up my mind thast I was going to try to get the need met, in bulk. This was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these pens!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid colorer and have bought really expensive pens, that make all sorts of claims about how great they are, but these RoseArt pens, which I got more of for a lesser price, are the absolute S***T! They distribute the color nicely as they dry, spreading evenly, leaving virtually scratchless color marks! The tips are tapered enough for the finest of details. This is my 2nd box so now my wife and I have our own box! I will continue to buy these pens!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wayne Turner

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited to get these. They love the variety of colors that the other kits we have gotten haven't had. They showed me all the slightly different colors that they were using.
customer_reviews.author: Sisrea

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was absolutely thrilled and enjoys the utility of the case. Product was delivered weeks before the expected date. Many thanks from my eLearning grandchildren.....and me!
customer_reviews.author: JaniceSusan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for! Ink runs over pretty quickly and the label on the pens peels off. Looks ugly and cheap... which it is of course.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: These markers are awesome!! There are so many colors to choose ...
customer_reviews.text: These markers are awesome!! There are so many colors to choose from. It was a steal because I bought them when they were only $10. I've used them to color many things. I'd actually like to get another set of them in the near future. They are very great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamaul11490

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! Great markers!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these markers! They have vibrant colors, are high quality and easily wash off when they color in spots where they shouldn’t be used?
customer_reviews.author: Katie Terramiggi

customer_reviews.title: Great colors but...
customer_reviews.text: While I love these markers for the multitude of colors, I have 2 that are "invisible" they're not dry I can see where I have colored, have tried on different types of paper, and over previously colored items and still nothing, even tried if it was glow in the dark/uv activated but no dice.. my friend bought the same pack and had the same issue. Over all FANTASTIC colors! I use them with adult Coloring books and mandala books and do somewhat bleed through but not totally.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: only okay
customer_reviews.text: Many of the colors, though their caps are different colors, are identical in color. Also, some seem dried out though they're new. I also agree with other reviewers that the box is HORRIBLE! I'm an adult and cannot re-insert the markers into the box properly, leaving the box bulging and jammed. The "ledge" on the marker onto which the cap snaps is just where I would like to hold the marker - uncomfortable. The Crayola markers are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with the New Adult Coloring books
customer_reviews.text: These are great markers. My teen daughter loves having so many colors to choose from. She uses these in conjunction with the adult coloring books. She doesn't like using colored pencils (sensory thing) and they are always a pain to keep sharpening. These are a nice alternative. The box is good because it keeps the markers organized and easy to see the colors. The markers last a long time and don't become dry. I also got it at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ang S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens and the color selection you get. I love them so much this is the third pack I have bought. I like the tip on them when coloring I can color pretty much everything but the really fine art other than that you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: TaybayTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Oooh...look at all of the colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I can't believe I got this cheaper because the box was a little bit scuffed up!!! Super deal. Great value. Lots of different colors. Think about buying used because I got an amazing price and the markers are brand new!!!
customer_reviews.author: buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Bottomless marker color!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a baby shower so everyone could draw on wooden blocks as part of a group activity. Two months later and the markers are still going strong! My toddlers use them daily and they show no sign of running out of color! Magic markers indeed!
customer_reviews.author: HrnyhairyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: OK but not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I would order these for a child but I’m not sure I would recommend them for adults. They are a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bethmax

customer_reviews.title: Bummed out!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is terrible. The colors are very dull and watery. I tried to use them on medium weight paper and could barely see the color. Also, there are LOTS of repeated colors. I don't just mean two of a kind, I mean more like 5 of a kind. I got 5 greys all the same EXACT same shade, 4 light yellows EXACTLY the same shade, and many more were like that. So frustrated. I was really looking forward to a variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: melissa k kutz

customer_reviews.title: Missing color from my markers
customer_reviews.text: I had several markers come with no color in them and they draw clear or draw so faint that they are useless. My students were disappointed in this... I attached a picture of two of the markers that were first noticed but since then we have found more...
customer_reviews.author: Josh Belcher

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful - I got these for my 14yo grandson for coloring/drawing and he loved them - if a teenager likes anything that’s remarkable haha
customer_reviews.author: KELLEY W

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the size. But......My complaint is that my set has 3 markers that have no color at all. They have never been filled, the felt tip is still colorless. The set also contained several markers that were already dry. The markers that have color seem to work well. I haven't used them enough to know how quickly they will dry out. I probably will not purchase again. Quality control really needs to step up their game.
customer_reviews.author: Kim HendersonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Darker colors not really in this pack; some markers missing color/tint altogether.
customer_reviews.text: A good number of markers, though some key colors seem to be missing. It wouldn't appear so looking at the caps, but some colors are extremely close in color, while others (namely darker, more saturated colors) just aren't there. Also, at least 5 of my markers had no tint whatsoever -- clearly a quality control issue. I included an example of two teals/blues that had no tint, compared to a pink that did.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The markers are fine tipped enough to do detail work in coloring books
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between 3 and 4 stars. The markers are fine tipped enough to do detail work in coloring books, and although there are a lot of markers, many of them are so close to each other in color that there really arent as many colors as it looks like, and the cap is not always anywhere near what the actual color of the ink is. That being said, there are still a good variety of colors and I said, they are fine tipped.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE W.

customer_reviews.title: Adult markers for adult coloring books @ a value price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been coloring with Rose Art markers long b4 the coloring revolution. I loved them years ago and I love them now! Why? 1.they don't bleed through paper. 2. They blend nicely. 3. They last longer than crayola. 4. They have a fine tip for coloring small areas but also can color vast areas my angling the marker.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice set of markers for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of markers for the price. A large selection of colors and a smaller tip which makes it easier to color or outline. The markers don't have the color names on them, but it is very easy to select the color that you want. I test the color on paper before using to see if its the shade I want. My son had to do a poster for a school project; we used these and it turned out great. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LucyA

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: These markets are not up to par. There were a bunch dried out when I opened the box. Colors don't last long. Crayons super tips are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stockslader

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not anything fancy; great product for a good price when looking to buy large quantities. They are great for my classroom use.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Coluzzi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, economical markers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Several of the markers, especially the blues, were colorless. The other thing is my son loves looking at the color names and there were no names on the markers, which was a bummer for us. But even with some colors missing, the price was still pretty good for 100 markers and they color fine.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So many colors and they don’t duplicate! You can even play fun color sorting games with them. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Mismatch
customer_reviews.text: There are many colors in this set. Many of them are not the same color on inside as outside of marker and many are the same color. Unfortunately, these are colors that i don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of markers for the price. Just like the crayola ones
customer_reviews.text: You get quite a lot of markers for the price. The ink and quality is just as good as the crayola brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie624

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I liked using this item in my Sunday School class during art activity time.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Good markers
customer_reviews.text: Great array of colors. Good quality. All markets functional. I enjoy coloring with them with my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: Great set up!!
customer_reviews.text: Lobe this box of markers. Easy to see colors. Easy to put away for the little ones. Great set up!!! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiBaj

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, a great present
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love the many choices of colors they have with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Complaints: 1) Too many colors are so similar you can’t distinguish them 2) Yet there seem to be some colors missing. I tried all the blues and couldn’t find a really light blue. 3) The lid doesn’t always give a good indication of the color. And there are no names though I don’t know if this is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Olubunmi Odumade

customer_reviews.title: For the most part, nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Nice marker set overall. My only issue is that a few of the colors dried up in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s good price, the marker is ok. The color is not rich enough, but for beginners is ok.
customer_reviews.author: mini

customer_reviews.title: Half dried out
customer_reviews.text: Half the markers don’t work when they are supposed to be brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is poor, but markers seem fine.
customer_reviews.text: I only received 99 markers in this box. Also, all the colors were mixed together making it hard to see the entire range/spectrum of any specific color. The box, which is supposed to assist in storage and use, isn't very handy at all and the insert to pull out the markers fell apart on the very first use. As for the markers themselves, they will meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For The $
customer_reviews.text: These markers are great!!!! We've had them for a couple months now and use them weekly between four people. Not a dried out one yet! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a ton of markers
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of markers for a good price. All the colors my kid could possibly need.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I I purchased these for crafts and projects however some of them are dry or completely devoid of color. (Brand new box) the tip of my darker blue marker is white! No ink at all! I called rose art customer service and they want to know the exact number of dried markers and the colors, I haven't even made it through the whole box and I have severely dry markers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Dried up. Boooo
customer_reviews.text: The item itself was very inexpensive. That being said. I can't say if it is just old, dried up or damaged stock but many of these markers just are not coloring.
customer_reviews.author: silvershoes

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, poor longevity
customer_reviews.text: So many beautiful colors in shades not in any other sets, but they were either partially dried out or contained very little ink because most didn't last long, struggled to complete one area in ok new picture with many.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea markers could be so horrible. These markers lasted no more than a month or so before drying up. The caps don’t fit well so perhaps that could have contributed to their drying up so quickly or maybe that is just a secondary flaw. Don’t waste your money on these. Buy Crayola.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Biesecker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed... Some markers don't mark...
customer_reviews.text: These would be great if all the markers were actually the color of their caps... Some markers show a color on the cap, but they are clear... Not like they are dried out, just don't have any pigment. It's been about 30 minutes and I'm down to 96 markers. :(
customer_reviews.author: shanzams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy..... long wait
customer_reviews.text: Great colors!! Long lasting. My kids love them. This is my second time buying these. I should've bought two because I waited an entire MONTH for this one box!
customer_reviews.author: Renewed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the value, work really well and plenty of color options
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G

product_meta.title: RoseArt SuperTip Washable Markers 50-Count Assorted Colors Packaging May Vary 3438VA-24
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1This super tip marker value pack offers a variety of 100 unique and different colors to make any art project bright and fun. RoseArt's super tip markers are long-lasting and provide vibrant color lay down without bleeding through your paper! The pull 'n' pop packaging design makes it easy to access each marker and provides a convenient storage method. Perfect for home or school! Key Features: Large assortment of 100 various marker colors Long-lasting, vibrant colors Pull 'n' Pop Packaging design Certified non-toxic Quality Guaranteed
feature_bullets: Large assortment of 100 various marker colors
